about_the_game:
Dig Out Two AA Batteries and Put on Your Seatbelt!


In this classic Gameboy-Color styled action-adventure, take up your staff and explore a land of monsters, animal friends, and puzzles! Fight your way through dank, themed dungeons, and learn the best strategies against each of 30+ enemy types.

Collect key items to unlock new moves, and discover hidden interactions between items, enemies, and characters. Fight daunting bosses, solve mysteries, save the land, and make grandma proud!

Features


  • A cozy, lovingly-crafted overworld with many unique areas and secrets to discover.
  • 4+ Unique, themed dungeons to explore and conquer.
  • Several key items and item upgrades to expand your move set.
  • Fast-paced movement and combat.
  • Charming, funny characters and interactions.
  • Minigames, a trading sequence, and "No, I swear, you can unlock Luigi"-style bragging rights collectibles.
  • Beautiful Gameboy Color inspired art.
  • Delightful, heartfelt soundtrack.
  • Built in randomizer.

In this classic Gameboy-Color styled action-adventure, take up your staff and explore a land of monsters, animal friends, and puzzles! Fight your way through dank, themed dungeons, and learn the best strategies against each of 30+ enemy types.

Collect key items to unlock new moves, and discover hidden interactions between items, enemies, and characters. Fight daunting bosses, solve mysteries, save the land, and make grandma proud!

name: Wizwag

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Explore a charming, mysterious world in a classic, top-down action adventure! Investigate monster-infested dungeons, collect items to unlock new moves, and solve puzzles to uncover the truth, with help from some unusual friends.
